programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un ķepaiņi palīdz Karlam pagatavot saldējumu visiem. Ja vien Ātrmeistars viņiem netraucēs...

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa ķepaiņu celtnieku ģimene pārceļas uz kaimiņpilsētu Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, rotaļājas un būvē visu kopienai nepieciešamo.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ātri jānomazgā Greitvejas dubļainais motocikls! Vīlers un suņi ķeras pie darba, lai uzbūvētu risinājumu pirms sacensībām. Vectēva Grants īpašā diena! Bet, kad nepieciešama suņu palīdzība, viņiem jāmaina vectēva dienas plāni.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Kaja gaida, kad brauks ar Nebulatoru, bet Tims nav drošs.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Isu apciemos Rāpuļu karaliene, bet dārzā valda nekārtība! Dora palīdz Isai gatavoties Karalienes vizītei. Dora iepazīstas ar sliņķi Semiju, kuram jāpagūst laikus nokļūt dienas nometnē, lai visus pārsteigtu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Sekojot iemīļotā detektīva pēdās, Barbabravo meklē noziegumu, kas jāatklāj. Vai viņš spēs atklāt noslēpumaino ledus skulptūras pazušanu? Barbabērni gatavo savu mīļāko varoņu iedvesmotus tērpus, taču varoņi neeksistē bez ļaundariem...

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Kaja gaida, kad brauks ar Nebulatoru, bet Tims nav drošs.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad Ātrmeistars uzbūvējis nedrošu rotaļlaukumu, Rabla komandai jādomā radoši un jāuzbūvē jauns laukums no veciem materiāliem. Pilsētas Čili Kūkarū ir apdraudēts, kad sāk iebrukt Rātsnama jumts! Par laimi suņi zina, kā to salabot.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora uzzina, ka viņas vecmamma nav svinējusi savus Pieaugšanas svētkus, un sarīko viņai pārsteiguma ballīti ar īpašu kleitu, diadēmu un kurpēm! Doras draugam Koko nav aizraujoša stāsta, ar ko izklaidēt biedrus, tāpēc viņi dodas pie Pastāstu koka!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni laimē skārienpaliktni. Visi grab to izmantot, tāpēc čiepj viens pēc otra. Barbazū krāj ūsainu slavenību bildes. Diemžēl nekur nevar atrast pēdējo: Čārlzu Pakavu-Ūsaini. Viņam ir aizdomas par sazvērestību...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo aizmirsa nodot bibliotēkas grāmatu. Bibliotekārs Misters Stingrais šodien ciemojas pie Barbatēta, tāpēc Barbabo izlemj aizbēgt. Barbamamma grib, lai barbabērni uzkopj savas istabas. Viņi slēpjas, lai izvairītos no garlaicīgā darba.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kucēni atrod dinozauru kaulus un nolemj uzcelt dinozauru muzeju. Kad Omars salauž kāju, kucēniem jānodrošina rampas, lai viņš tomēr spētu turpināt piegādāt pastu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Vasarā pilsētā ir ļoti karsti un komandas uzdevums ir to atvēsināt ar akvaparku. Kāds viesis sagādā ķibeles celtniecībā, kad komanda būvē spēļu istabu Lūkasam un Lilijai.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Šodien būs pirmā skolas diena... Ja Rabla komanda pabeigs būvēt skolu! Bebrs grib visu ūdeni savākt sev, tāpēc komandai jāizdomā, kā glābt Zojas augus.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni pielipuši pie televizora, tāpēc vecāki mudina viņus veidot raidījumus. Barbapapas apmeklē evolūcijas muzeju. Programmā: Zemes radīšana, Pirmskembrija perioda zemūdene un... dinozauri!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbazū gatavs palīdzēt, bet Barbagudrais un Barbabella ļaunprātīgi izmanto viņa labestību un padara viņu traku. Barbazū nejauši atklāj spēju atdarināt Barbatēti. Viņš to izmanto, lai sadalītu darbus brāļiem un māsām. Vai viņi to uzzinās?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pēc piedzīvotām likstām Barbabravo vairs nemaz nespēj pārtapt. Visa ģimene dodas viņam palīgā. Barbabravo nespēj nosēdēt mierā un ilgi koncentrēties vienai nodarbei. Barbalala piedāvā iemācīt viņam kontroli. Vai viņai izdosies?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais un Barbabo uzbūvē milzīgu koka rotaļlietu, ko darbina bio degviela.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: 10-year-old Hazel Wells has just moved to Dimmadelphia with her family and is struggling with the change. On top of that, her beloved brother, Antony, is away at his first year of college and Hazel is feeling lonely without him. When she has a rocky start at her new school and Antony has to cancel a visit, Hazel tries to run away to visit Antony.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel must take matters into her own hands to get to the bottom of Devs surly attitude and save pizza! When Hazel makes a wish to understand why Dev acts the way he does, she gets paired with him for a class scavenger hunt. They struggle to work together, but, as the day goes on, they develop a friendship. However, that falls apart when Devs dad, Dale, belittles their effort, causing Dev to turn on Hazel again to save face. Will Dev be able to overcome his pride and finish the project, or will his issues with his dad tank both their grades?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Raphs strength wont save him when hes caught between the Mechazoids and the notorious street gang known as Purple Dragons! programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Will and Min show Jack around to help him find a good story. Lily spills boba in Jacks suitcase and tries to hide the evidence. Jack tries to find "the big picture" as Lily shows him how to spend a perfect summer day in Canyon Valley.

programme.title: Wylde Pak

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: When Lily starts digging to find out why her favorite ice cream truck is selling shaved ice, she uncovers a town-wide conspiracy.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Lily and Jack are half-siblings thrown together for a summer who must learn how to navigate their new family dynamic while also helping with the Wylde Pak familys chaotic pet grooming business.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Hazel wishes to be 13 so that she can go see a PG-13 movie by herself, Cosmo and Wanda turn her into a teenager. They go the mall and have a blast doing "teenage things" while they wait for the movie. But, as a side effect of her wish, Hazel starts going through the fairy version of puberty: pasta puberty! As she struggles to deal with pesto pimples and mozzarella mood swings, Hazel wishes that Cosmo and Wanda would just get lost! They disappear, leaving Hazel to deal with the zany pasta puberty alone. // Hazel wishes to be a fairy to join Cosmo and Wanda at their Fairy Convention, but since its against Da Rules, she settles on looking like a fairy instead. Once at the con, however, Hazel stumbles into the DMV booth and signs a "Fairy-fication" certificate, turning her into a real fairy! It also brings her anti-fairy into existence, who steals the certificate. Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must get the certificate back from her anti-fairy, or Hazel will be stuck as a fairy forever!

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max appears to have willingly switched to the villains side, prompting President Kickbutt to assign Captain Perfect as Phoebes new superhero partner. Max quickly gains the villains trust and leads Kiefer and the other henchmen to his house to fight Phoebe and Captain Perfect. During the fight, Max and Kiefer capture Phoebe and Captain Perfect. Max reveals he was never really evil, but was only pretending to gain access to the Chip-Chucker. Max and Phoebe defeat Kiefer and the henchmen, and they discover that the Chip-Chucker contains technology that leads them to the identitly of the Mastermind, who is revealed to be Lazlo Chance, B.C.s father. Chloe is anxious about going to the dance with B.C. and keeps trying to avoid him whenever a slow song comes on. Seeking help from Phoebe, she hides in the photo booth to teleport home. However, Jinx and Booch find a photo of her mid-teleport (they cannot see who did the teleporting), leading them to believe theres a superhero among them.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must pass Wish Trials in Fairy World to prove theyre a match. Hazel crumbles under pressure, struggling to make a wish confidently, which leads to Cosmo and Wanda failing to grant her half-formed wishes. Consequently, Jorgen reassigns Hazel to a boisterous, no-nonsense fairy named Cookie, who only cares about efficiency, not accuracy. Displeased with the cookie-cutter nature of Cookies magic, Hazel must find a way to confidently wish for Cosmo and Wanda to be her fairies again. // Intimidated by her new classmates, Hazel wishes to be friends with the teachers instead. Once her wish is granted, she and the teachers play around the schoolyard and neglect to prep for the big test coming up. When test day arrives, Hazel realizes her wish has decreased the teachers maturity. Theyre acting like little kids! Hazel has to make a choice-keep her teacher friends and let the whole school fail or change them back and brave making new friends the hard way.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Having filled up another wish card, Hazel is enjoying a fun, fantasy wish. Meanwhile, Cookie, the fairy who got bested by Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda after their Wish Trials, is setting a trap for our trio. She tricks them into publicly talking about magic at a fake museum exhibit, records the evidence, and then takes them to Fairy Court. Now, Hazel must prove that Cosmo and Wanda are innocent, or else lose them forever.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: After breaking up with Granny Tentacles, GrandPat is heartbroken. To get the old couple back together, Squidina turns The Patrick Show into a dating game, where GrandPat has to compete against Slappy and Larry for Grannys love. // Bikini Bottom is ravaged with an ice cream eating beast. The Ice Cream Man and Ice Cream King team up to capture this mysterious monster. Squidina tags along to film their mission, then is put in a compromising position when she learns that Patrick has been eating the citys ice cream all along.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its Kindness Day! Mr. Guzman announces that if all students complete one act of kindness, theyll get a class pizza party-and Hazel wants that pizza! But when Dev refuses to participate, Cosmo and Wanda call on the Pe-Az, a trio of alien diplomats, to reason with him. Despite their best efforts, Dev outsmarts the Pe-Az and uses their alien technology to get rid of all the pizza on Earth. // Hazel must take matters into her own hands to get to the bottom of Devs surly attitude and save pizza! When Hazel makes a wish to understand why Dev acts the way he does, she gets paired with him for a class scavenger hunt. They struggle to work together, but, as the day goes on, they develop a friendship. However, that falls apart when Devs dad, Dale, belittles their effort, causing Dev to turn on Hazel again to save face. Will Dev be able to overcome his pride and finish the project, or will his issues with his dad tank both their grades?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Having filled up another wish card, Hazel is enjoying a fun, fantasy wish. Meanwhile, Cookie, the fairy who got bested by Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda after their Wish Trials, is setting a trap for our trio. She tricks them into publicly talking about magic at a fake museum exhibit, records the evidence, and then takes them to Fairy Court. Now, Hazel must prove that Cosmo and Wanda are innocent, or else lose them forever. // Frustrated by her moms split attention between work and home, Hazel wishes to be her assistant to spend more time with her. Cosmo and Wanda turn Hazel into an adult, and she spends the day struggling to fulfill her duties. Even though being a working adult is hard, Hazel is excited to be spending so much quality time with Angela. But when the puppet standing in for Hazel at school gets called into the nurses office, Angela rushes off to take care of it and Hazel must give the presentation instead!

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Dirk is wrongfully accused of stealing a Canyon Valley landmark so Min comes out of lawyer retirement to help him.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: When Lily starts digging to find out why her favorite ice cream truck is selling shaved ice, she uncovers a town-wide conspiracy.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Jasmine, and Winn take an online BFF compatibility test. To their surprise, they fail! Nobody is fazed, except for Hazel, who overthinks the results and wishes that her friends could know exactly whats in her head. Cosmo and Wanda grant the wish, which lands all of them inside Hazels mind. As they go through her mind like a museum, Hazel continues to overthink everything they see. Now, Hazel must overcome her negative thoughts and battle a literal mind worm to get her friends out! // When Hazel wishes she didnt have a gap in her teeth, the Tooth Fairy fills her gap with a talking tooth, Toothica. At first, she seems like a lot of fun, but when Toothica gets Hazel in trouble with her parents and plans a party in Hazels mouth Hazel isnt invited to, Hazel decides she wants her gone! The Tooth Fairy, however, takes Toothicas side and is even set on honoring her at a gala. Hazel must find a way to prove Toothica is no good and get back her gap or be stuck with this rotten tooth forever.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Danger Force

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: The school is looking for a new mascot, and Chloe and her new friends think they can make an impression by designing the winning entry. Chloe, Jinx, and Booch create a costume they are excited about, leaving it at the beach house until the they can present it at school. Meanwhile, Phoebe learns that Max has gotten them jobs at the school, but while he has a cushy Vice Principal job, she is the new Art teacher. Their argument over this leads to accidentally destroying it the new mascot costume. After Chloe discovers what theyve done and is furious with them, Max and Phoebe realize that being her guardian comes with more responsibility than they imagined.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Raphs strength wont save him when hes caught between the Mechazoids and the notorious street gang known as Purple Dragons! As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes to meet a dinosaur. Cosmo and Wanda bring Bary, a Baryonyx from the Cretaceous period, to present day. Hazel makes wishes to find Bary a job but unfortunately, Bary never quite fits in. Worse, his giant dinosaur tail knocks out power to the whole city, ruining Dimmadelphias prized Electric Light Ice Cream Float Parade. With Hazel feeling remorseful, Bary musters inspiration from his hero, the great Thomas Rex-ison, and uses his dinosaur smarts to try to save the day. // Hazel has planned a night of watching scary movies with her new friend, Jasmine, but it turns out Jasmine hates scary movies. Rather than change the plan, Hazel wishes Jasmine had no fears. When Cosmo and Wanda grant the wish, the fears escape Jasmines mind, coming into the real world. Hazel tries fighting the fears off but learns its Jasmine who must face them to make them disappear. Now, shes got to talk her new friend into doing everything shes most afraid of, which gets the attention of Fear Itself!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Frustrated by her moms split attention between work and home, Hazel wishes to be her assistant to spend more time with her. programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Jacks new friend Beef invites him to a sleepover. Jack, a sleepover newb, freaks out over impressing his new friend. // Jack and Lil try to prove theyre the one true local, enduring a series of bizarre quests in the local dive restaurant Dead Eds.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward gets stuck indoors with SpongeBob and Patrick during a storm in Pineapple Fever, and then in Chum Caverns, Plankton creates an underground restaurant that rivals the Krusty Krab! 09:00 Rock, Paper, Scissors Rock, Paper and Scissors are three best friends who share an apartment together and compete over everything. Week to week, they have tiny problems that always get out of hand. (Subtitled) 09:15 Rock, Paper, Scissors Rock, Paper and Scissors are three best friends who share an apartment together and compete over everything. programme.title: Transformers: Earthspark
programme.desc: An Autobot starship crash lands on Earth! The Autobots and Maltos must get there first to protect it, and whomever is inside, from the Decepticons - but Optimus Prime and Megatron disagree on mission strategy... Good intentions cause friction and endanger more than just the mission.

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: When Catarina Stripe takes the role of substitute teacher, Clawdeen and Toralei become unlikely partners.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Bests sound effects threaten to derail Besters one chance to shine on the opening night of a Flip Flops play. // Best and Besters "inbestigation" into some missing golf balls escalates into a full-blown mountain rescue mission.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester decide Grumpy Pants needs more excitement and take him to have the most extreme cup of tea ever. // In this years Capture the Flag contest Best listens to other peoples ideas even if they havent got a war room.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: The twins go to great lengths to protect Bests enjoyment of his book and realize spoilers arent so bad after all. // Best and Bester may have jumped the line for the new fish restaurant, but once inside things take a dramatic turn.

programme.title: Harvey Beaks
programme.desc: Welcome to the peck-uliar world of Harvey Beak, a moderately mellow young bird who flies around his magical forest home of Littlebark Grove, with best-bird friends Fee and Foo, a pair of boisterous twins. The three feathered friends are always looking for new things to do, zooming around the forest embarking on adventures. With many other animals living in the forest, theres plenty of new characters and creatures for the trio to meet, often involving them on their mischievous escapades. Harvey lives with his parents, Irving Beaks and Miriam Beaks.

programme.title: Wallykazam!
programme.desc: When Wally uses his magic stick and the letter T to turn a rock into a talking friend named Rockelle, she leads him and Norville on a journey to find a famous treasure. But Bobgoblin is close behind, and he wants that treasure!

programme.title: Winx Club
programme.desc: Meet Bloom, a girl from Earth, who after she finds out that she is a fairy joins Alfea College on the planet Magix- a magical universe that is inhabited by fairies, witches and other mythical creatures. At Alfea College, fairy warriors from all over the universe study to improve their supernatural powers and here Bloom befriends five other fairies - Stella, the fairy of the Sun, Flora, the fairy of nature, Tecna, the fairy of technology, Musa, the fairy of music and Aisha, the fairy of waves. Together, this group of girls known as the Winx, become best friends and the force to be reckoned with as they experience incredible adventures while defending their universe from varous enemies.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: A prequel to SpongeBob SquarePants, featuring the beloved characters as children, spending their summertime at Camp Coral having fun doing typical camp activities like building campfires, catching jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck, causing a bit of trouble and chaos on the side. SpongeBob SquarePants is a ten-year-old with a red cap, goofy and friendly as hes always been. Lets not forget SpongeBobs friends, Patrick, Sandy, and Squidward, whos a bit older than the others and works as a junior counselor. All other characters such as Mr. Krabs, Mrs. Puff, SpongeBobs nemesis Plankton, and Karen are a part of this adventure as well.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness
programme.desc: Po the Panda trains, battles, learns, teaches, stumbles, gabs and ""geeks out"" as the newest hero in the Valley of Peace. Now living in his permanent home at the Jade Palace with the rest of the Furious Five, Po will have to take on new responsibilities and face brand-new adversaries (not seen in the movies) in his continuing education as the Dragon Warrior...for being the Dragon Warrior is not a destination, its a journey (unfortunately for Po, that journey is uphill).

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: When Aang is assigned to help defend a town from a monster that has been plaguing the town, his lack of ability and knowledge becomes obvious, as he doesnt know what to do. However, when Sokka tries to rush to Aangs rescue during the fight, he himself becomes captured and is taken away by the monster, which turns out to be from the spirit world. Aang promises Katara that hell find Sokka and bring him back, but with Aang even doubting himself, will he be capable of finding where the monster went?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: Transformers: Earthspark
programme.desc: The Maltos enjoy a snow day while, back at Base, something has the Autobots in a red-hot rage... When Twitch returns to HQ for snacks, she gets trapped inside and finds herself stuck in the middle of the scariest family feud of all-time. Can Twitch survive long enough to cure her allies before they tear each other apart?

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Watzie and Count Fabulous accidentally stumble into the human world and must work together to make it home safe. // Twlya must complete a rite of passage by pursuing a Night Terror through her friends nightmares.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Sharing isnt easy for the twins and after a particularly heated argument they decide split the treehouse in half. // In order to win a local gardening competition, Best attempts to grow a plant, and Bester decides to be a plant.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Besters new pet comes between her and her brother. Theres nothing to it, Best must splat the cockroach! // Best and Bester go on an epic quest for a talking whale to prove they answered a board game question correctly.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best ruins Besters painting by accident so in order to avoid hurting her feelings he blames an innocent chicken. // Having lost their soccer ball over the garden fence, the twins have no option but to find a way to get it back.

programme.title: Nella the Princess Knight
programme.desc: Nella the Princess Knight is a British-American animated childrens television series that follows adventurous life of fun-loving and fearless princess Nella who turns into a knight when necessary in order to protect her kingdom. Her main treasure is not her crown but her beloved friends- unicorn Trinket, steed Clod and Sir Garrett. Nella sees that no harm comes to her friends and all other citizens of her kingdom. Together with her friends they have fun, solve mysteries and overcome hardships without which life is impossible even in the happiest kingdom.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Action-packed animation. Four pizza-loving brothers, Raph, Leo, Donnie and Mikey, are mutant turtles who live in the sewers under the streets of New York City. Raph is the oldest of the brothers and also their leader. Leo is the sword-swinging trickster of the team. Donnie is the smartest of the group and Mikey is the youngest brother and also the joker of the bunch. The adventures they go on help them discover their mystic ninja powers and understand the world around them. They learn to work better as a team of heroes. Skills they will need when faced with the enemies who wish to defeat the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy
programme.desc: Toast of T.U.F.F:Keswick invents an artificial intelligence toaster capable of doing much more than making perfect toast. When R.I.T.A. malfunctions and goes out of control, its up to Dudley and Kitty to save the citizens of Petropolis.Share-A-Lair:In an ironic twist, T.U.F.F. and D.O.O.M. are forced to share their HQs after destroying each others headquarters. Before completely obliterating each other, T.U.F.F. and D.O.O.M. agents realize its the Chameleon who has turned them against each other in an effort to further his own ambitions of domination.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: A prequel to SpongeBob SquarePants, featuring the beloved characters as children, spending their summertime at Camp Coral having fun doing typical camp activities like building campfires, catching jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck, causing a bit of trouble and chaos on the side. SpongeBob SquarePants is a ten-year-old with a red cap, goofy and friendly as hes always been. Lets not forget SpongeBobs friends, Patrick, Sandy, and Squidward, whos a bit older than the others and works as a junior counselor. All other characters such as Mr. Krabs, Mrs. Puff, SpongeBobs nemesis Plankton, and Karen are a part of this adventure as well.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

Meanwhile at home, Henry has to stay in hiding, keeping his sidekick job as a secret from his best friends, Charlotte and Jasper, and little sister Piper. programme.title: Папа попал
programme.desc: Вас приветствует самое весёлое семейное телешоу "Папа попал". По правилам проекта участником шоу может стать абсолютно любой мужчина, у которого есть уставшая от жизни и бытовых проблем жена, а также минимум двое детей. В то время, как супруга уезжает отдыхать на далёкий и красивый курорт, ее муж начинает принимать на себя все обязанности своей благоверной. На протяжении 7 дней папа должен будет выполнять абсолютно все задания и поручения, которые обычно выполняет его жена. Уборка, стирка, поход за покупками, воспитание детей и поддержание уюта в доме - всё это теперь ляжет на сильные плечи украинских пап. Более того, участники шоу должны будут сделать еще и множество чисто мужских работ, которые долгие годы их просили выполнить их супруги. Починить забор, поклеить обои, отремонтировать автомобиль или научить ребёнка танцевать - всё это также ляжет на плечи наших мужчин-участников. Папа может? Посмотрим!

programme.desc: Julien Benhamou, a famous photographer, presents us ten portraits of unique artists. All of them maintain a close relationship with their bodies, which they work on, shape, transform, and display. Often for play, sometimes out of necessity, but always with a creative purpose. Discover through this series the behind-the-scenes of the photo sessions and interviews with the artists about their incredible journeys.

programme.title: Female Gaze
programme.desc: Cet episode suit lartiste Gabriela Alatorre, entre le Mexique, Londres et Berlin, dans sa quete pour "habiter limage". Realisatrice et photographe, elle explore lautorepresentation feminine comme un territoire de resistance et de reinvention. Son travail brouille les frontières entre intime et collectif : en se photographiant, en photographiant dautres femmes, en leur apprenant à se photographier à travers des ateliers, elle construit un espace où les regards et les corps se croisent, se confrontent et se libèrent. À travers son parcours, le film interroge ce que signifie reprendre possession de son corps et de son image, se representer soi-meme sans mediation, et creer des histoires qui appartiennent enfin aux femmes elles-memes.

programme.desc: Cet episode suit lartiste Gabriela Alatorre, entre le Mexique, Londres et Berlin, dans sa quete pour "habiter limage". Realisatrice et photographe, elle explore lautorepresentation feminine comme un territoire de resistance et de reinvention. Son travail brouille les frontières entre intime et collectif : en se photographiant, en photographiant dautres femmes, en leur apprenant à se photographier à travers des ateliers, elle construit un espace où les regards et les corps se croisent, se confrontent et se libèrent. À travers son parcours, le film interroge ce que signifie reprendre possession de son corps et de son image, se representer soi-meme sans mediation, et creer des histoires qui appartiennent enfin aux femmes elles-memes.

programme.title: Spried ar Delfi
programme.desc: Katru darba dienu kopā ar dažādu nozaru speciālistiem, kā arī "Delfi" un citu mediju žurnālistiem aicinām skatītājus spriest par kādu aktuālu tematu - politiķu lēmumiem un to sekām, amatpersonu rīcību un tās motīviem, pārmaiņām sabiedrībā un tās virzītām iniciatīvām, pasaulē notiekošo un tā ietekmi uz Latviju, sasniegumiem un zaudējumiem sportā, kultūras personībām un procesiem.

programme.title: Ceļā uz mājām
programme.desc: Lauris Zalāns ar Madaru Kivkucāni dosies ciemos pie mākslinieces Elīnas Sandas Zaķes, kura savā studijā mācīs pamatus sienu apgleznošanā. Kurš labāk izpratīs krāsu teoriju, un vai pēc apmācībām Madara ar Lauri būs gatavi paši uzņemties sienu apgleznošanu?

programme.title: Meža stāsti
programme.desc: Ivars Linde - Meža vēstnesis no Zentenes. Vai meža var būt par daudz? Zentenē, 5ha paltībā - Ivars Linde ir veicis īstu transformāciju mežam un sev. Katru dienu viņa soļi ved uz vietu, kur reiz aizmirstā mežā ielokā tagad seljas bērnu stādītie koki. Māte daba sasēja viņa rokas ar darba rīkiem smago tehniku un darbu mūža garumā. Viņš nav cietumā - šī ir viņa brīvība. Šis stāsts, būs par neizmērojamu pieķeršanos dabai, par sirsnību un vīru kura dvēsele ir nolemta koku galotnēs.

programme.title: Līdakas un Leģendas
programme.desc: Brāļi Klēģeri apvieno spēkus ar Kurzemes puses mutīgo un kolorīto copmani un bitenieku Alex Crazy Fisherman, meklējot Ciecernieka mammas, bet brangākais pārsteigums viņus sagaida vienā no lielākajām Kurzemes upēm - Ventā!

programme.title: Copes lietas
programme.desc: Divu azartisku makšķernieku piedzīvojumi Latvijas un citu zemju ūdeņos. Iepazīsimies ar visiem makšķerēšanas veidiem - no pludiņa līdz pat mušai, ieskatoties gan pašā makšķerēšanas procesā, gan arī katra makšķerēšanas stila inventāra apguvē.

programme.title: Reģionālās Televīzijas piedāvā

programme.title: Meža veča emuāri
programme.desc: Māris Olte dosies ciemos pie meža saimnieces, kuras zināšanas un darba spējas liek uzmirdzēt meža skaistumam. Raidījums "Meža Veča Emuāri" ciemos pie Lienes, kura atklās ar kādiem izaicinājumiem un risinājumiem darba procesā saskārusies un rezultāts reiz ticis novērtēts ar augstāko atzinību meža nozarē - "Zelta čiekurs".

programme.title: Dzīves ceļojums
programme.desc: Bīskapa Andra Kravaļa dzīves ceļš atspoguļo ticības spēku un kalpošanas piepildījumu. Viņš nāk no lielas ģimenes Gulbenes pusē, kur bērnībā apgūts darba tikums un cieņa pret cilvēkiem. No mūzikas studijām un dienesta armijā līdz teoloģijas studijām Francijā viņa dzīve ir bijusi meklējumu un aicinājuma ceļš. 1999. gadā viņš tika iesvētīts par priesteri, bet kopš 2019. gada kalpo kā bīskaps. Viņa darbs vienmēr veltīts cilvēkiem - jauniešiem, draudzēm, ikvienam, kas meklē atbildes dzīvē. Tiekamies šonedēļ raidījumā "Dzīves ceļojums" bīskaps Andris Kravalis dalīsies savā ticības un pieredzes stāstā par aicinājumu, kalpošanu un dzīves misiju, kas ir kalpot un iedvesmot.

programme.title: Māksla dzīvot
programme.desc: Šonedēļ raidījumā "Māksla dzīvot" tiksimies ar neiroloģi un algoloģi - sāpju ārsti Lindu Zvauni. Skaidrosim, kā atklāt migrēnu, ko darīt ar nepārtrauktām galvassāpēm, un ko ar šo visu iesākt? Rubrikā par zobu veselību, uzzināsim kā uzlabot smaidu ar estētisko zobārstniecību un cik maģiski var uzburt jaunu smaidu, bet acu veselības sadaļā skaidrosim, cik svarīgi laicīgi pamanīt, ka bērns neredz, kā iedrošināt bērnu nebaidīties no brillēm. Bet dejotāja un horegrāfe, deju studijas "Vibe" vadītāja Elza Kronberga dalīsies stāstā kā Jaunzēlande izmainīja viņas dzīvi, kā Elza kļuva par dejotāju un cik ļoti iedvesmojoša dzīve bija Jaunzēlandē. Bet kāpēc Elza atgiezās mājās no zaļās salas, uzzināsiet jaudīgā dvēseles sarunā, kur neizpaliks visgaršīgākās pusdienas Latvijā!

programme.title: Veselības kompass
programme.desc: Raidījums stāstīs par dažādiem ar veselību saistītiem jautājumiem, sniegs padomus un vedīs tevi ceļā uz veselīgāku dzīvesveidu, labāku pašsajūtu un priecīgāku ikdienu! Katru nedēļu uz sarunu aicināsim dažādus jomas ekspertus un kopā gan sportosim, gan apspriedīsim dažādas ar veselību saistītas tēmas, gan arī izmēģināsim daudz kā jauna un mūsu veselībai noderīga!

programme.title: Meža veča emuāri
programme.desc: Māris Olte dosies ciemos pie meža saimnieces, kuras zināšanas un darba spējas liek uzmirdzēt meža skaistumam. Raidījums "Meža Veča Emuāri" ciemos pie Lienes, kura atklās ar kādiem izaicinājumiem un risinājumiem darba procesā saskārusies un rezultāts reiz ticis novērtēts ar augstāko atzinību meža nozarē - "Zelta čiekurs".

programme.title: Spried ar Delfi
programme.desc: Katru darba dienu kopā ar dažādu nozaru speciālistiem, kā arī "Delfi" un citu mediju žurnālistiem aicinām skatītājus spriest par kādu aktuālu tematu - politiķu lēmumiem un to sekām, amatpersonu rīcību un tās motīviem, pārmaiņām sabiedrībā un tās virzītām iniciatīvām, pasaulē notiekošo un tā ietekmi uz Latviju, sasniegumiem un zaudējumiem sportā, kultūras personībām un procesiem.

programme.title: Mēs darām tā
programme.desc: Katrs no videostāstiem seko līdzi galveno varoņu dienas gaitām, īpašu vērību pievēršot viņu iestrādātajai zaļā dzīvesstila rutīnai, kas saistīta gan ar saimniekošanu mājās, darbā un dārzā, atkritumu šķirošanu, enerģijas avotu un transporta izvēli, ēšanas paradumiem, darba pienākumu organizēšanu un atpūtu. Tie ļauj ielūkoties, piemēram, šobrīd Rīgā lielākās apkaimes biedrības pārstāvju ikdienā, kuri Grīziņkalnā rūpējas par zaļas un labiekārtotas ārtelpas izveidi, kā arī Pierīgas novadu mājsaimniecībās, vērtējot dažādu apkures veidu efektivitāti un draudzīgumu videi, dažādu mākslinieku saimniekošanas paradumos u.c. Raidījumu vada aktrise un kostīmu māksliniece Madara Botmane, iepazīstinot ar planētai draudzīga dzīvesstila ikdienas paradumiem Latvijas kopienās, komūnās, kolektīvos, apkaimēs un vairāku paaudžu ģimeņu mājvietās.

programme.title: Reģionālās Televīzijas piedāvā
programme.desc: 09:15 Jēkabpils laiks (Vidusdaugavas TV); 09:30 Skats no Ventspils (Kurzemes TV); 09:45 Vidzemē (Vidzemes TV) 10:00 Runā Latgale (LRT).

programme.title: Skats no Ventspils. Notikumi. Cilvēki. Viedokļi
programme.desc: Raidījums par notikumiem Ventspilī.

programme.title: Oranžās Indijas Brīvdienas
programme.desc: Grupa "Oranžās Brīvdienas" turpināja savu koncerttūri Indijā. Dodas ar vilcienu uz Mumbaju, lai iepazītu pilsētas kontrastus, ielu dzīvi un unikālos rajonus, tostarp Dharavi graustu rajonu un pasaulē lielāko brīvdabas veļas mazgātuvi. Taču jautrība un piedzīvojumi tiek sajaukti ar negaidītām ziņām - Deli koncerti atcelti. Kā tas mainīs grupas plānus?

programme.title: Gaidām ciemos!
programme.desc: "Gaidām ciemos!" ir par dažādu valstu kultūru, vēsturi un tradīcijām. Raidījuma vadītājs Zurabs Dvaļi ceļo un aicina skatītājus kopā ar viņu pastaigāties pa skaistām vietām, novērtēt apskates vietas, apbrīnot dabu un satikt interesantus cilvēkus. Skatītāji vispirms uzzinās interesantus vēstures faktus par dažādu valstu slavenākajiem vai aizmirstākajiem reģioniem, bet pēc tam izzinās kulinārijas tradīcijas, kopā ar raidījuma viesiem gatavojot vairākus ēdienus.

programme.title: Ziņkārīgais Čiekurs ciemos pie Sofi
programme.desc: Kas sagaida Latviju 1. janvārī, kad stāsies spēkā norma, ka dzīvnieku glābēju organizācijām ir jāpārreģistrējas kā patversmēm? Cik viegli vai grūti to ir izdarīt un kā turpmāk valstī tiks glābti nelaimē nonākuši suņi un kaķi, par to sezonas noslēdzošajā epizodē runāsim ar dzīvnieku aizsardzības biedrības "Ķepu sargi" vadītāju Karīnu Vilsoni, Saeimas deputātu Jāni Grasbergu un uzņēmēju Egiju Gailumu.

programme.title: Copes Frekvence
programme.desc: Baļotes ezers pazīstams visā Latvijā kā viena no labākajām karpu copes vietām, bet kas notiek ar tā plēsēju resursiem? Regulārie ziņojumi par zandartiem, kas nokož karpinieku ēsmas, liek domāt, ka Baļotē ir izveidojusies plaša un agresīva plēsēju populācija. Ar ezera apsaimniekotāju ielūgumu devāmies šo izpētīt.

programme.title: Meža veča emuāri
programme.desc: Raidījuma vadītājs Māris Olte tiksies ar dažādām personībām, lai kliedētu mītus un izzinātu videi draudzīgus meža apsaimniekošanas principus, kā arī aktualizēs dabas vēsturiskā mantojuma varenību.

programme.title: Māksla LV
programme.desc: Par lellēm Mikus zināja jau sen, jo ir gana daudz mūzikas rakstījis leļļu teātra izrādēm. Bet par lellēm kā mākslu iedomājās tikai tad, kad satika Veltu Emīliju, kura savas lelles veido gan izrādēm, gan… Kam Velta Emīlija vēl veido savas lelles? To Mikus noskaidros. Bet - vai ar lellēm strādā tikai tie, kas jau kopš bērnības spēlējas ar balerīnām, klauniem un alvas zaldātiņiem, tas vēl jānoskaidro. Mikus tincinās objektu teātra "ievazātāju" Latvijā. Tiksies ar Pifu un viņa pavēlnieci. Nedaudz roku iemēģinās arī visu leļļu lelles - marionetes vadīšanā. Visbeidzot, Mikus veiks eksperimentu, lai noskaidrotu, vai viņš nav pupofobs.

programme.title: ReTV Ziņas
programme.desc: Informācijas līderis reģionos - ReTV. Jaunākās ziņas katru darbdienu 15.00, 19.00 un 21.00.

programme.title: Manas jaunās mājas - Latgale
programme.desc: "Manas jaunās mājas - Latgale" pirmajā epizodē ciemojamies pie aktiera Marģera Eglinska, kurš savas profesionālās gaitas uzsācis Liepājā, bet nu ir aktieris Daugavpils teātrī. Uzzināsim, kā pēdējā laikā aktuālo jautājumu par aktieru pāriešanu uz citiem teātriem komentē bijušais Nacionālā teātra direktors Ojārs Rubenis un ko par to saka Latvijas Universitātes asociētā profesore, antropoloģe Aivita Putniņa.

programme.title: Mēs varam - mēs darām!
programme.desc: Televeikala skatlogs. Iedvesmojies kā hobiju pārvērst par pelnītspējīgu biznesu. Uzzini, kas tuvākā un tālākā apkārtnē atjaunots, uzlabots un pilveidots. Seko līdz, stāstiem ar kuriem varam lepoties un iespējām, kas var būt aktuālas tieši Tev!

programme.title: Brīvdienas sākas tagad!
programme.desc: Šajā epizodē Keita viesosies Lubānā un izbaudīs dažādus aktīvās atpūtas veidus dabā. Savukārt Nikija dosies iepazīt, ko piedāvā tūrisma un atpūtas centrs "Ezernieki". Bet satiekoties, oho, meitenes izbaudīs luksusa brīvdienas šarmantā villā Igaunijā! Smelies idejas piedzīvojumiem un košām atmiņām raidījumā "Brīvdienas sākas tagad!".

programme.title: ReTV Ziņas
programme.desc: Informācijas līderis reģionos - ReTV. Jaunākās ziņas katru darbdienu 15.00, 19.00 un 21.00.

programme.title: Džona Doreda sala
programme.desc: Filma par pirmo latviešu izcelsmes kinooperatoru Džonu Doredu, kas darbu ar kino kameru apguvis Pathe, pirmā pasaules kara gados aktīvi filmējis notikumus dažādās frontes līnijās un ir vienīgais ārzemnieks, kas nelegāli nofilmējis Ļeņina bēres. Filmas scenārijs veidots pēc Džona Doreda un viņa sievas Elizabetes vēstulēm, dienasgrāmatām. Tā ir filma par profesiju un likteni, profesiju un mīlestību, dzīvi un nāvi. 2007.gads.

programme.title: Māksla LV
programme.desc: Par lellēm Mikus zināja jau sen, jo ir gana daudz mūzikas rakstījis leļļu teātra izrādēm. programme.title: Mans RIFS
programme.desc: Šajā epizodē viesojas ģitārists Aigars Aress Māls. Viņa muzikālais ceļš sākas ģimenes vidē, kur tēvs, vectēvs un vecmāte visi bija saistīti ar mūziku. Visspligtākā atmiņa Aigaram ir palikusi, kad tēvs pirms gulētiešanas spēlēja Iron Maiden rifus- skaņas, kas kļuva par neatņemamu bērnības sastāvdaļu un pavēra turpmāku ceļu mūzikai.

programme.title: Personības kods
programme.desc: Trešās sezonas pirmā raidījuma viesis "OPEN radošais centrs" izveidotājs un vadītājs Edijs Klaišis. Edijs jau vairākus gadus palīdz grūtībās nonākušiem jauniešiem, arī viņa paša dzīve nav iztikusi bez dažādiem izaicinājumiem.

programme.title: Kursu kari
programme.desc: Šī ir erudīcijas, zināšanu un veiksmes pārbaudes spēle, kuru izveidoja 16 un 17 gadus jauni skolēni. Rīgas Mākslas un mediju tehnikuma audzēkņi savā skolā apgūst dažādas radošas profesijas. Ir arī tādas mākslas un prasmes, kuras labi noder TV spēles veidošanai. Tad nu jaunieši no 1.kursa, pieaicinot dažus 2.kursa skolēnus nolēma veidot paši savu TV spēli, kas būtu vienlaicīgi gan izklaide, gan mācību process. Šis ir pirmais mēģinājums visu izdarīt pašiem. Nu, gandrīz visu. Kļūdu, protams, ir gana daudz. Bet nekļūdās vien tie, kas neko nedara. Tādēļ, skatītāji, esiet iecietīgi un saprotoši, jūsu vērtējumam nododam savu pirmo kucēnu, kuru negrasāmies slīcināt, bet lolot, pucēt un uzlabot - erudīcijas, prāta un veiksmes spēli - Kursu kari.

programme.title: Mans RIFS
programme.desc: Šajā epizodē ģitārists Didzis Kikusts dalās ar saviem pirmajiem soļiem mūzikā. Viņš atceras bērnības iespaidus, ceļu no disko melodijām un saksofona spēles līdz brīdim, kad ģitāra kļuva par viņa galveno izteiksmes veidu. Stāstā atklājas gan muzikālās ietekmes, gan personīgās pieredzes, kas veidojušas viņa radošo pasauli.

programme.title: Zaļā gaisma
programme.desc: Auto, drošība uz ceļa, jaunāko noteikumu un likumu skaidrojumi. Raidījumā pastāstīsim par jaunākajām aktualitātēm, kas jāzina un jāņem vērā katram autovadītājam.

programme.title: Piedzīvojums dabā
programme.desc: Piedzīvojumu meklētājs Jānis Kļaviņš dodas jaunajā un vēl nezināmajā, izpētot dabu pārgājienos.

programme.title: Līdakas un Leģendas
programme.desc: Brāļi Klēģeri apvieno spēkus ar Kurzemes puses mutīgo un kolorīto copmani un bitenieku Alex Crazy Fisherman, meklējot Ciecernieka mammas, bet brangākais pārsteigums viņus sagaida vienā no lielākajām Kurzemes upēm - Ventā!

programme.title: Meža stāsti
programme.desc: Ivars Linde - Meža vēstnesis no Zentenes. Vai meža var būt par daudz? Zentenē, 5ha paltībā - Ivars Linde ir veicis īstu transformāciju mežam un sev. Katru dienu viņa soļi ved uz vietu, kur reiz aizmirstā mežā ielokā tagad seljas bērnu stādītie koki. Māte daba sasēja viņa rokas ar darba rīkiem smago tehniku un darbu mūža garumā. Viņš nav cietumā - šī ir viņa brīvība. Šis stāsts, būs par neizmērojamu pieķeršanos dabai, par sirsnību un vīru kura dvēsele ir nolemta koku galotnēs.

programme.title: Personības kods
programme.desc: Rīgas Stradiņa universitātes aciklisko sporta veidu katedras docente Inese Ļubinska. Inese ir cieši pārliecināta, ka tieši kustībā cilvēks saglabā gan fizisko, gan mentālo veselību un dzīvesprieku līdz pat mūža galam.

programme.title: Dzīves ceļojums
programme.desc: Jezuītu tēvs Jānis Meļņikovs ir cilvēks, kurš jau agrā jaunībā sajuta aicinājumu kļūt par priesteri. Viņš absolvējis Rīgas Garīgo semināru un 2007. gadā iesvētīts par katoļu priesteri. Kalpošana draudzē Liepājā un vēlākā pievienošanās jezuītu ordenim, paralēli garīgajai kalpošanai. Jānis Meļņikovs guvis plašu pieredzi akadēmiskajā vidē, šobrīd turpinot studijas arī doktorantūrā. Daudzi viņu atpazīst kā raidījumu "Garīgums mūsdienās" un "Svētdienas doma" veidotāju, kā arī ilggadēju Radio Marija Latvija programmu vadītāju. Raidījumā "Dzīves ceļojums" tēvs Jānis dalīsies pārdomās par ticību, mūsdienu cilvēka meklējumiem un to, kā dzīvē ieraudzīt jēgu ar sirds acīm.

programme.desc: Katrs no videostāstiem seko līdzi galveno varoņu dienas gaitām, īpašu vērību pievēršot viņu iestrādātajai zaļā dzīvesstila rutīnai, kas saistīta gan ar saimniekošanu mājās, darbā un dārzā, atkritumu šķirošanu, enerģijas avotu un transporta izvēli, ēšanas paradumiem, darba pienākumu organizēšanu un atpūtu. Tie ļauj ielūkoties, piemēram, šobrīd Rīgā lielākās apkaimes biedrības pārstāvju ikdienā, kuri Grīziņkalnā rūpējas par zaļas un labiekārtotas ārtelpas izveidi, kā arī Pierīgas novadu mājsaimniecībās, vērtējot dažādu apkures veidu efektivitāti un draudzīgumu videi, dažādu mākslinieku saimniekošanas paradumos u.c. Raidījumu vada aktrise un kostīmu māksliniece Madara Botmane, iepazīstinot ar planētai draudzīga dzīvesstila ikdienas paradumiem Latvijas kopienās, komūnās, kolektīvos, apkaimēs un vairāku paaudžu ģimeņu mājvietās.

programme.title: Spried ar Delfi
programme.desc: Katru darba dienu kopā ar dažādu nozaru speciālistiem, kā arī "Delfi" un citu mediju žurnālistiem aicinām skatītājus spriest par kādu aktuālu tematu - politiķu lēmumiem un to sekām, amatpersonu rīcību un tās motīviem, pārmaiņām sabiedrībā un tās virzītām iniciatīvām, pasaulē notiekošo un tā ietekmi uz Latviju, sasniegumiem un zaudējumiem sportā, kultūras personībām un procesiem.

programme.title: ReTV Ziņas
programme.desc: Informācijas līderis reģionos - ReTV. Jaunākās ziņas katru darbdienu 15.00, 19.00 un 21.00.

programme.title: Veselības kompass
programme.desc: Šonedēļ raidījumā "Veselības kompass" runāsim par veselīgu miegu un tā nozīmi labas veselības uzturēšanā! Kāda ir digitālās higiēnas un viedierīču lietošanas ietekme uz miegu, kāpēc ir svarīgi pievērst uzmanību krākšanai un kā ar to cīnīties, kā arī, kā pūcēm un cīruļiem salāgot ikdienu ar savu iekšējo ritmu? Par šiem jautājumiem runāsim un meklēsim atbildes kopā ar Dr.med Juri Svažu no Miega slimību centra.

programme.title: Meža veča emuāri
programme.desc: Māris Olte tiksies ar LVM vecāko plānotāju, lai runātu par moderno mežu apsaimniekošanu, jeb kā tas izskatās dzīvē. Tāpat apspriedīs kādi izaicinājumi, kādi riski un kādas jaunākās tendences šajā jomā.

programme.title: ReTV Ziņas
programme.desc: Informācijas līderis reģionos - ReTV. Jaunākās ziņas katru darbdienu 15.00, 19.00 un 21.00.

programme.title: Māksla dzīvot
programme.desc: Šonedēļ raidījumā "Māksla dzīvot" vieda saruna ar āsti - narkoloģi un biheiviorālās terapijas speciālisti Ilzi Maksimu. Sarunā ne tikai par alkoholismu, bet arī par cēloņiem, risinājumiem un vai ierobežojumi sabiedrībā spēs palīdzēt cilvēkiem ar atkarībām. Redzes veselības rubrikā uzzināsim par miopiju, jeb tuvredzības epidēmiju, bet zobu veselības rubrikā izzināsim nākotnes iespējas un vai zobu varēs izaudzēt? Bet sarunā pie Hercoga pusdienēm diriģents un kora "Balsis" māklsinieciskais vadītājs Ints Teterovskis atklās savu Austrālijas un Jaunzēlandes noslēpumu.

programme.title: Copes lietas
programme.desc: Divu azartisku makšķernieku piedzīvojumi Latvijas un citu zemju ūdeņos. Iepazīsimies ar visiem makšķerēšanas veidiem - no pludiņa līdz pat mušai, ieskatoties gan pašā makšķerēšanas procesā, gan arī katra makšķerēšanas stila inventāra apguvē.

programme.title: Spried ar Delfi
programme.desc: Katru darba dienu kopā ar dažādu nozaru speciālistiem, kā arī "Delfi" un citu mediju žurnālistiem aicinām skatītājus spriest par kādu aktuālu tematu - politiķu lēmumiem un to sekām, amatpersonu rīcību un tās motīviem, pārmaiņām sabiedrībā un tās virzītām iniciatīvām, pasaulē notiekošo un tā ietekmi uz Latviju, sasniegumiem un zaudējumiem sportā, kultūras personībām un procesiem.

programme.title: Kursu kari
programme.desc: Šī ir erudīcijas, zināšanu un veiksmes pārbaudes spēle, kuru izveidoja 16 un 17 gadus jauni skolēni. Rīgas Mākslas un mediju tehnikuma audzēkņi savā skolā apgūst dažādas radošas profesijas. Ir arī tādas mākslas un prasmes, kuras labi noder TV spēles veidošanai. Tad nu jaunieši no 1.kursa, pieaicinot dažus 2.kursa skolēnus nolēma veidot paši savu TV spēli, kas būtu vienlaicīgi gan izklaide, gan mācību process. Šis ir pirmais mēģinājums visu izdarīt pašiem. Nu, gandrīz visu. Kļūdu, protams, ir gana daudz. Bet nekļūdās vien tie, kas neko nedara. Tādēļ, skatītāji, esiet iecietīgi un saprotoši, jūsu vērtējumam nododam savu pirmo kucēnu, kuru negrasāmies slīcināt, bet lolot, pucēt un uzlabot - erudīcijas, prāta un veiksmes spēli - Kursu kari.

programme.title: Reģionālās Televīzijas piedāvā
programme.desc: 02:15 Jēkabpils laiks (Vidusdaugavas TV); 02:30 Skats no Ventspils (Kurzemes TV); 02:45 Vidzemē (Vidzemes TV); 03:00 Runā Latgale (LRT).

programme.title: ReTV Ziņas
programme.desc: Informācijas līderis reģionos - ReTV. Jaunākās ziņas katru darbdienu 15.00, 19.00 un 21.00.

programme.title: Vācijas futbola Bundeslīga. Minhenes "Bayern" – Dortmundes "Borussia"
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.title: Ninbo "WTA 500". Ekaterina Alexandrova vs Elena Rybakina
LaLiga. "Levante" – "Rayo Vallecano"
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Francijas futbola 1. līga. Marseļas "Olympique" – "Le Havre"
programme.desc: PSG, AS Monaco, Marseille, Olympique Lyonnais and Lille... just to name a few. Ligue 1 is currently full of well-organised football teams and incredible European talent, who are a complement to the sport. As the highest professional division in France, it has established itself as one of the top five leagues on the continent. Lyon are the most successful team in regards to consecutive titles, whereas PSG and AS Monaco have managed to propel themselves to the highest achievements in the league, with calculated foreign investment. With the latter coming from a principality, Ligue 1 is another example of a domestic league that provides cross-border competition. From southern wine-growing regions such as Bordeaux, to the historically renowned capital of Paris, we cover the whole of France.

programme.title: Football: Saudi Pro League
programme.desc: The Saudi Pro League (SPL) is the top-tier football league in Saudi Arabia, featuring the countrys best clubs and top international players. Established in 1976, it has grown into one of the most competitive leagues in Asia. The SPL attracts global attention with high-profile signings, intense rivalries, and a passionate fan base.

programme.title: English Football League Championship
programme.desc: The English Football League Championship or the "EFL" as it is otherwise referred to, is the stepping stone from the wilderness of English football, to the riches associated with the promised land, that is the English Premier League. In keeping with traditions of this club championship, we bring you first-hand, live coverage of developments for this division. Touted as one of the hardest leagues to manoeuvre out of, it was founded in 2004 and has truly delivered with its play-off system, offering a whole new dimension of entertainment, compared to other leagues out there. From "Sleeping Giants" such as Nottingham Forest and Sheffield Wednesday, to the jostling pack of Preston and Brentford, marquee match-ups every week will decide the final Championship standings, come the end of May.

We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.title: Football: French Ligue
programme.desc: PSG, AS Monaco, Marseille, Olympique Lyonnais and Lille... just to name a few. Ligue 1 is currently full of well-organised football teams and incredible European talent, who are a complement to the sport. As the highest professional division in France, it has established itself as one of the top five leagues on the continent. Lyon are the most successful team in regards to consecutive titles, whereas PSG and AS Monaco have managed to propel themselves to the highest achievements in the league, with calculated foreign investment. With the latter coming from a principality, Ligue 1 is another example of a domestic league that provides cross-border competition. From southern wine-growing regions such as Bordeaux, to the historically renowned capital of Paris, we cover the whole of France.

programme.title: English Football League Championship
programme.desc: The English Football League Championship or the "EFL" as it is otherwise referred to, is the stepping stone from the wilderness of English football, to the riches associated with the promised land, that is the English Premier League. In keeping with traditions of this club championship, we bring you first-hand, live coverage of developments for this division. Touted as one of the hardest leagues to manoeuvre out of, it was founded in 2004 and has truly delivered with its play-off system, offering a whole new dimension of entertainment, compared to other leagues out there. From "Sleeping Giants" such as Nottingham Forest and Sheffield Wednesday, to the jostling pack of Preston and Brentford, marquee match-ups every week will decide the final Championship standings, come the end of May.

programme.desc: Coverage of Italys top-flight football league.

programme.title: Football: Serie A
programme.desc: Coverage of Italys top-flight football league.

programme.title: Football: LaLiga
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Год Золотой рыбки
programme.desc: Три заветных желания, написанные на бумажечках подругами, взялась исполнить певица Лада Рыбка. У нее всё складывается отлично: гастроли, запись на телевидении, любовь. Перед свадьбой с Вадимом Лада собирает одноклассниц на "девичник". Барышни судачат о жизни, и Лада убеждает учительницу Асю, милиционершу Машу и бизнес-леди Нину, что в жизни возможно всё, надо просто чётко знать, что же тебе нужно! Подруги пишут на листочках желания, а Лада обещает, что они обязательно исполнятся! Только вот судьба распоряжается по-иному.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Андрей Макаров - начальник экспертно-криминалистической лаборатории МВД. Он и его коллеги расследуют не одно преступление, но главная задача Макарова - найти убийцу сестры.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Андрей Макаров - начальник экспертно-криминалистической лаборатории МВД. Он и его коллеги расследуют не одно преступление, но главная задача Макарова - найти убийцу сестры.

programme.title: Восточные сладости
programme.desc: Таня и Игорь мечтают стать счастливыми родителями, но пока все их попытки оказываются тщетными. Последней надеждой супругов становится клиника репродуктивной медицины в Стамбуле, которая работает по новейшим американским технологиям. В Турции пара попадает на прием к известному репродуктологу Кемалю. А уже спустя две недели Таня узнает о своей беременности, которая теперь ее совсем не радует - она понимает, что отцом будущего ребенка может быть вовсе не ее муж…

programme.title: Шуша
programme.desc: Главная героиня – эксперт-криминалист Александра Ладынина, которая живет ради любимой работы и верит только фактам. Но ее жизнь переворачивается в тот момент, когда в их отдел переводится майор полиции Илья Власов – давний знакомый Шуши.

programme.title: Я думал,ты будешь всегда
programme.desc: Самовлюблённый мужчина лишь после смерти преданной ему жены осознаёт, что она была главным человеком в его жизни. Он отправляется в прошлое, чтобы покаяться перед ней, а ещё - найти ответ на вопрос, почему втайне от него она пожелала быть похороненной рядом со старой могилой неизвестного человека...

programme.title: Восточные сладости
programme.desc: Таня и Игорь мечтают стать счастливыми родителями, но пока все их попытки оказываются тщетными. Последней надеждой супругов становится клиника репродуктивной медицины в Стамбуле, которая работает по новейшим американским технологиям. В Турции пара попадает на прием к известному репродуктологу Кемалю. А уже спустя две недели Таня узнает о своей беременности, которая теперь ее совсем не радует - она понимает, что отцом будущего ребенка может быть вовсе не ее муж…

programme.title: Восточные сладости
programme.desc: Таня и Игорь мечтают стать счастливыми родителями, но пока все их попытки оказываются тщетными. Последней надеждой супругов становится клиника репродуктивной медицины в Стамбуле, которая работает по новейшим американским технологиям. В Турции пара попадает на прием к известному репродуктологу Кемалю. А уже спустя две недели Таня узнает о своей беременности, которая теперь ее совсем не радует - она понимает, что отцом будущего ребенка может быть вовсе не ее муж…

programme.title: Год Золотой рыбки
programme.desc: Три заветных желания, написанные на бумажечках подругами, взялась исполнить певица Лада Рыбка. У нее всё складывается отлично: гастроли, запись на телевидении, любовь. Перед свадьбой с Вадимом Лада собирает одноклассниц на "девичник". Барышни судачат о жизни, и Лада убеждает учительницу Асю, милиционершу Машу и бизнес-леди Нину, что в жизни возможно всё, надо просто чётко знать, что же тебе нужно! Подруги пишут на листочках желания, а Лада обещает, что они обязательно исполнятся! Только вот судьба распоряжается по-иному.
